DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether walk exercise dietary treatment obesity associate decrease daily spontaneous physical activity and\or increase time spent sedentary activity . Our hypothesis practice walk exercise phase weight stability follow dietary treatment obesity lead reduction spontaneous physical activity and\or increase time spent sedentary activity .
DOC.brief_title: Walking , Spontaneous Physical Activity Lipid Oxidation After Dietary Treatment Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: The subject study randomise 2 group : A group usual follow-up group usual follow-up associated recommendation introduce program walking achieve gradually 2000-2500 kcal/week .
